item.title: CVE-2024-4657|2024-09-25T13:43:38.752Z -- talent%20software -- bap%20automation
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Talent Software BAP Automation allows Stored XSS.This issue affects BAP Automation: before 30840.
